name: Evrmore
description: Evrmore (EVR) is a user-friendly blockchain designed to simplify DeFi and crypto assets. Evrmore enhances the UTXO model with built-in DeFi features, eliminating the need for complex smart contracts and coding skills. This means anyone can use it without being a tech expert. Evrmore offers fast transactions, minimal fees, and advanced DeFi primitives, making it easy to create and swap assets securely and efficiently.
